mapper.select: select count(id) from cl_user where DATE_FORMAT(regist_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
select count(id) from cl_user where DATE_FORMAT(login_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
select count(id) from cl_borrow where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')

select count(distinct borrow.id) from cl_borrow_progress as progress ,cl_borrow as borrow where DATE_FORMAT(progress.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and progress.state in ('20','26') and borrow.id = progress.borrow_id and borrow.again ='10'
select count(id) from cl_borrow_progress where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and state in ('20','26')
select count(DISTINCT borrow_id) from cl_borrow_progress where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and state = '30'
select count(id) from cl_borrow_repay_log where DATE_FORMAT(repay_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
select count(id) from cl_borrow_progress where state = '30'
select count(id) from cl_borrow_repay where state = '10'
select sum(amount+penalty_amout) from cl_borrow_repay where state = '20'
select sum(amount+penalty_amout) from cl_borrow_repay where state = '20' and penalty_amout>0
select sum(amount) from cl_pay_log where scenes = '10' and state = '40' and remark !='线下放款审核'
select sum(amount) from cl_pay_log where scenes = '10' and state = '40' and remark ='线下放款审核'
select sum(amount+penalty_amout) from cl_borrow_repay_log where repay_way = '10' and type in('10','20')
select sum(amount+penalty_amout) from cl_borrow_repay_log where repay_way in ('20','30') and type in('10','20')
SELECT SUM(amount) FROM `cl_borrow` WHERE state NOT IN (10,20,22,21,26,27) AND address LIKE #{address}
SELECT SUM(brl.amount) FROM `cl_borrow_repay_log` brl LEFT JOIN cl_borrow b ON brl.borrow_id = b.id WHERE b.address LIKE #{address}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cl_user_base_info WHERE register_addr LIKE #{address}

select create_time 'key',count(DISTINCT t.borrow_id) 'value' from (select id,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') create_time,borrow_id from cl_borrow_progress where state = '30' and TO_DAYS(SYSDATE()) - TO_DAYS(create_time) <= 15 ) t GROUP BY create_time

select repay_way 'key',count(id) 'value' from (select id,case when repay_way = '10' then '自动代扣' when repay_way = '20' then '银行卡转账' when repay_way = '30' then '支付宝转账' when repay_way = '40' then '认证支付' end repay_way from cl_borrow_repay_log ) t GROUP BY repay_way

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d') 'key', count(id) 'value', NOW() FROM ( SELECT id, DATE_FORMAT(repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d') repay_time FROM cl_borrow_repay WHERE DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ) t GROUP BY repay_time

select create_time 'key',count(id) 'value' from (select id,DATE_FORMAT(repay_time,'%Y-%m-%d') create_time from cl_borrow_repay_log where TO_DAYS(SYSDATE()) - TO_DAYS(repay_time) <= 15 ) t GROUP BY create_time
select count(id) from cl_user where 1=1
select count(id) from cl_borrow where 1=1
select count(id) from cl_borrow_progress where state in ('20','26')
select auth.* from cl_user as usr left join cl_user_auth auth on usr.id = auth.user_id where DATE_FORMAT(usr.regist_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
select * from cl_borrow where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')

select borrow.* from cl_borrow as borrow ,cl_borrow_progress as progress where DATE_FORMAT(progress.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and progress.state = '30' and borrow.id = progress.borrow_id;
